heading: Modern terraced homes
description: Tulip Terraces is a proposed gated community consisting of 30 units of 2 storey, 2-bedroom terraced homes located in an already highly secured neighborhood at East Legon-School Junction.

heading: Own a home at an affordable price
description: Own a home at one of the best locations in Ghana for as low as $49,900. The community is strategically placed granting you access to popular hangout spots.

heading: An exceptional lifestyle
description: Tulip Terrace will be an exciting place to live and an exceptional investment. The building has been designed by highly competent architectural practice with international experience and it will provide its homeowners with world class luxuries and amenities at affordable prices.
